# UIImagePickerController.CameraCaptureMode.photo

**Case**

Specifies that the camera captures still images.

## Declaration

```swift
case photo
```

## Constants

- **UIImagePickerController.CameraCaptureMode.video**: Specifies that the camera captures movies.

items.description: Specifies that the camera captures movies.
items.name: UIImagePickerController.CameraCaptureMode.video

title: UIImagePickerController.CameraCaptureMode.photo
